headline: Casual Dining Chains Feeling Effects of Inflation and Slowing Economy
summary: The US restaurant industry is feeling the effects of inflation and a slowing economy, with some fast-casual chains like Chipotle and Sweetgreen seeing their shares sink. Bloomberg's Daniela Sirtori reports.

raw.headline: Casual Dining Chains Feeling Effects of Inflation and Slowing Economy
raw.summary: The US restaurant industry is feeling the effects of inflation and a slowing economy, with some fast-casual chains like Chipotle and Sweetgreen seeing their shares sink. Bloomberg's Daniela Sirtori reports.

headline: As Cava, Chipotle Sink, Left-for-Dead Rivals Stage Comeback
summary: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc., Cava Group Inc. and Sweetgreen Inc. — hot names in what had been a booming fast-casual segment — have each sunk around 20% or more since reporting lackluster second-quarter earnings.  Casual-dining chains are posting strong sales growth that is suddenly rekindling investor interest in a business that many had condemned in recent years to a slow demise.  Wall Street is taking notice: shares of Cheesecake Factory Inc. — known for massive portions and over-the-top decor — are up nearly 29% this year, more than tripling the S&P 500 Index.

headline: INTRODUCING ZIPOTLE: CHIPOTLE PARTNERS WITH ZIPLINE FOR AERIAL DELIVERY
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) today announced it is partnering with Zipline, the world's largest autonomous delivery system, to fly digital orders to guests' locations in greater Dallas. A small number of Zipline users will have access to Zipotle starting today, ahead of a broader service launch in the coming weeks.
